meanings.definition: A type of red wine made from the Pinot grape.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy sipping on pinots during dinner.
meanings.sent2: The winery offered a selection of pinots for tasting.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone was impressed by the abundance of pinots.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the pinots filled the room like a bouquet of flowers.
meanings.sent5: Her love for pinots was evident in the way she carefully stored each bottle.

meanings.definition: Plural form of the word 'pinot', referring to multiple instances of the wine.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant had a special on pinots this week.
meanings.sent2: We decided to bring two pinots to the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The pinots on the shelf seemed to be whispering to each other.
meanings.sent4: The collection of pinots sparkled like a treasure trove.
meanings.sent5: His passion for pinots was evident in the way he discussed each bottle's origin.
